https://www.ajandera.com/ en-us Daily basis entrepreneurship life Alda Jandera Daily basis entrepreneurship life. Tips and experiences from avarted side or entrepreneurship. I am senior software developer with more than 10 years of experience. Working with many international teams, from 2014 create own crm software and actually develop startup based on mathematical modeling in ecommerce. I want to show you regular days which stand behind it.
Ales Jandera ajandera@ajandera.cz
